content.title: PAD Risk Factors
content.definition: Smoking (strongest modifiable), diabetes, hypertension, dyslipidemia, CKD, advanced age.
content.statement: PAD Risk Factors is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding PAD Risk Factors helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of PAD Risk Factors include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of PAD Risk Factors.
